title: [Large-scale] Comparative Analysis of Reflection-Based Learning Strategies to Enhance Nurses' Clinical Vision and Judgment

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing practice experience and comprehension of reflective learning concepts
context.additional_context: Configuring experimental environments using ICT-based simulation tools for practicing nurses

learning_goals: Learners can improve fixation-of-gaze patterns by 20% or more during clinical scenario observations through reflective journaling and oral discussions.
Learners can compare advantages and disadvantages of reflective learning methods to determine their applicability in practice.
Learners can improve judgment accuracy by 15% when performing touch panel simulation tasks.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
